featureDescription.name: token
featureDescription.description: The token that represents the verb

typeDescription.name: uk.ac.nactem.uima.eupmc.RemovedAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A link to an annotation that has been removed

featureDescription.name: annotation
featureDescription.description: The removed annotation

typeDescription.name: uk.ac.nactem.uima.eupmc.Fact
typeDescription.description: A fact - the span will cross the verb and the two arguments

featureDescription.name: verb
featureDescription.description: The verb of the fact

featureDescription.name: negation
featureDescription.description: True if this is negated, False (or missing) if not

featureDescription.name: argument
featureDescription.description: The first argument of the fact verb

featureDescription.name: argument2
featureDescription.description: The second argument of the fact verb (if any)

featureDescription.name: metaknowledge
featureDescription.description: Metaknowledge about the fact

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: The index of the sentence in the original document that contains the fact. Assumes that the same sentence splitter is used as was originally used to create the fact.

typeDescription.name: uk.ac.nactem.uima.eupmc.AlternateToken
typeDescription.description: Alternate versions of a token (e.g. ascii, truecase etc.)

featureDescription.name: ascii
featureDescription.description: The ascii version of the token

featureDescription.name: ascii_truecase
featureDescription.description: The ascii, truecase version of a token

featureDescription.name: token
featureDescription.description: The token being annotated

featureDescription.name: asciiBase
featureDescription.description: Ascii verson of the base form

featureDescription.name: dictionaryType
featureDescription.description: The type of the dictionary used

featureDescription.name: dictionaryFeatures
featureDescription.description: A list of the dictionary features

featureDescription.name: token
featureDescription.description: The token with the features

featureDescription.name: syntacticRole
featureDescription.description: The relationship of the argument to the fact (e.g. subject, verb, object, modifier)

featureDescription.name: preposition
featureDescription.description: Any modifier of the argument

featureDescription.name: entity
featureDescription.description: The entity contained within the argument

featureDescription.name: base
featureDescription.description: The base form of the verb

featureDescription.name: frame
featureDescription.description: The Verb Frame in use in this Fact

typeDescription.name: uk.ac.nactem.uima.eupmc.FactEntity
typeDescription.description: The named-entity part of an argument of a fact

featureDescription.name: semanticType
featureDescription.description: The semantic type of the named entity

featureDescription.name: extendedEntity
featureDescription.description: Optional extended representation of the entity

typeDescription.name: uk.ac.nactem.uima.eupmc.FactMetaknowledgeItem
typeDescription.description: An item of metaknowledge about a fact

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the item of metaknowledge

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The value of the metaknowledge item
